mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(sel_pric * qunt), 0) AS sals_pric, DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS tody, CONCAT(SUBSTR(_UTF8'일월화수목금토', DAYOFWEEK(CURDATE()), 1), '요일') AS day, DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%y-%m-%d %h:%i') AS now FROM rels_tb WHERE DATE_FORMAT(dat, '%y-%m-%d') = CURDATE();
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_anal_view WHERE ordr_type_seq = 1 AND ordr_dat = CURDATE();
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM online_anal_view WHERE ordr_type_seq = 2 AND ordr_dat = CURDATE();
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ordr_num_tb WHERE ordr_stat_seq = 4 AND ordr_dat = CURDATE();
SELECT COUNT(qunt) AS qunt FROM exchng_refnd_tb WHERE dat = CURDATE();

SELECT IFNULL(pr.prodct_nme, '-') AS prodct_nme, sum(re.qunt) as qunt, (re.sel_pric * sum(re.qunt)) AS sals_pric FROM rels_tb re JOIN prodct_tb pr ON re.prodct_seq = pr.prodct_seq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(dat, '%y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() GROUP BY re.prodct_seq ORDER BY qunt DESC LIMIT 0 , 10;

SELECT IFNULL(a.prodct_nme, '-') AS prodct_nme, IFNULL(a.ordr_amont, 0) AS tody_ordr_amont, (IFNULL(a.ordr_amont, 0) - IFNULL(b.ordr_amont, 0)) AS ordr_amont, IFNULL(a.sals_pric, 0) AS sals_pric FROM (SELECT re.prodct_seq, IFNULL(pr.prodct_nme, '-') AS prodct_nme, SUM(re.qunt) AS ordr_amont, re.dat, SUM(re.sel_pric * re.qunt) AS sals_pric FROM rels_tb re JOIN prodct_tb pr ON re.prodct_seq = pr.prodct_seq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(re.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') = CURDATE() GROUP BY re.prodct_seq) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT re.prodct_seq, IFNULL(pr.prodct_nme, '-') AS prodct_nme, SUM(re.qunt) AS ordr_amont, re.dat, SUM(re.sel_pric * re.qunt) AS sals_pric FROM rels_tb re JOIN prodct_tb pr ON re.prodct_seq = pr.prodct_seq WHERE DATE_FORMAT(re.dat, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) GROUP BY re.prodct_seq) b ON a.prodct_seq = b.prodct_seq ORDER BY ordr_amont DESC , tody_ordr_amont DESC LIMIT 0 , 10;

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A.sals_pric), 0) AS sals_pric FROM (SELECT IFNULL(sel_pric * SUM(ordr_amont), 0) AS sals_pric FROM total_anal_view WHERE ordr_dat BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 09:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 11:59:59') GROUP BY prodct_seq) AS A UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A.sals_pric), 0) AS sals_pric FROM (SELECT IFNULL(sel_pric * SUM(ordr_amont), 0) AS sals_pric FROM total_anal_view WHERE ordr_dat BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 12:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 14:59:59') GROUP BY prodct_seq) AS A UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A.sals_pric), 0) AS sals_pric FROM (SELECT IFNULL(sel_pric * SUM(ordr_amont), 0) AS sals_pric FROM total_anal_view WHERE ordr_dat BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 15:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 17:59:59') GROUP BY prodct_seq) AS A UNION ALL SELECT IFNULL(SUM(A.sals_pric), 0) AS sals_pric FROM (SELECT IFNULL(sel_pric * SUM(ordr_amont), 0) AS sals_pric FROM total_anal_view WHERE ordr_dat BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 18:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(), '%Y-%m-%d 21:00:00') GROUP BY prodct_seq) AS A;
